notesStmt.note: 1 sheet: Decorated border, with depicitons of fish and birds.
Includes stamp of the archives of Raphael Zilberman of Safed (ארכיון רפאל זילברמן, צפת).

msContents.textLang: Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE), Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Hebrew
